card_text: This card's name is also treated as "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss". This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "NEX". When this card attacks or is attacked, draw 1 card. Reveal that card, and based on its type apply the proper effect:$N●Monster: End the Battle Phase.$N●Spell: You can change this card's attack to a direct attack.$N●Trap: This monster is changed to Defense Position.
